com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.elements

Class AbstractIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.ImageIcon
      • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.elements.AbstractIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PetriPlaceIcon, PetriTransitionIcon

    public abstract class AbstractIcon
extends javax.swing.ImageIcon
    Abstract class for icons that will be used by UI labels.

    Serialized Form
